scripts.build-all: npm run build-normal && npm run build-minify
scripts.build-normal: node-sass --source-map true --output-style expanded --include-path scss --include-path node_modules/normalize.css scss/gundam.scss css/gundam.css
scripts.build-minify: node-sass --source-map true --output-style compressed --include-path scss --include-path node_modules/normalize.css scss/gundam.scss css/gundam.min.css
